name: Taahirah Ismail
message: Lyle is genuinely one of the best people I know. He is constantly pushing himself to do better and works hard to achieve his goals. He is a great colleague and friend to have around, and I can't wait to see him flourish in this field.

name: Cheslyn Herman
message: Within the time that I have worked with Lyle, I can honestly say that he is an amazing individual to have in ones team. His quirky personality and charms brings out the best qualities in each of his teammates. They say pressure makes diamonds and he is definitely a diamond.

name: Ethan Lesar
message: In my interactions with him, I have found him to be both exceptionally helpful and intelligent. His ability to quickly understand complex issues and offer practical solutions is truly impressive. His willingness to assist his colleagues with their tasks and his positive attitude makes him a valuable member of the team. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a knowledgeable and supportive colleague.

name: Abdoel-Maaliek Samaai
message: He is a very vibrant person. Who love spending time with friends and is not to face a challenge head on. He has the problem solving skills. He helps when others do need his help. He is caring and a great person to have as a friend.

name: Jamie-Lee Kinnear
message: Lyle is a remarkable programmer and has an analytical approach to problem solving. He is a hardworking individual and dedicated to his work. He is a great peer and a team player. He show's initiative and I believe he would be a valuable asset to any company that would be lucky to have him.
